remarks: The set of projective subspaces is compactly atomistic: if an atom is in the projective subspace closure of a set of atoms, it also belongs to the projective subspace closure of a finite subset of that set. Analogous to Lemma 3.3.10 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 74.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Sep-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
